area = "Temple_FIRE_NE";
areaname = "Fire Temple";

dungeon = "FireTemple";
A_sprites = [{name:"Gold Gate",model:"object",x:19,y:26,type:"switch_gate",colour:"topaz"},{name:"Gold Gate",model:"object",x:20,y:26,type:"switch_gate",colour:"topaz"},{name:"Ruby Gate",model:"object",x:19,y:29,type:"switch_gate",colour:"ruby"},{name:"Ruby Gate",model:"object",x:20,y:29,type:"switch_gate",colour:"ruby"},{name:"Moonstone Gate",model:"object",x:19,y:33,type:"switch_gate",colour:"moonstone"},{name:"Moonstone Gate",model:"object",x:20,y:33,type:"switch_gate",colour:"moonstone"},{name:"Soul Cage",model:"examine",x:9,y:5,walkspeed:-1,conv:"c_flamesouls"},{name:"EXIT",model:"DOOR12",x:3,y:34,dir:"s",dest:["Temple_FIRE_hub",17,7]}];
var _doneThis = false;
var d = 0;
while(d < GameData.plotVars.FireTempleTest.DONE.length)
{
   if(GameData.plotVars.FireTempleTest.DONE[d] == area)
   {
      _doneThis = true;
   }
   d++;
}
if(GameData.plotVars.SAVIOURS_CH3 === 1 && !_doneThis)
{
   A_sprites.push({name:"Aalia",model:"aalia",x:9 + (!TempVars.AaliaNE001?0:1),y:6,walkspeed:-1,dir:(!TempVars.AaliaNE001?"n":"w"),elem:"LIGHT",conv:"c_Saviours"});
}
if(GameData.CHAPTER == 3 && !GameData.plotVars.CH3TRILOBITES[1][_root.area])
{
   A_sprites.push({name:"Trilobite Warrior",model:"trilobite2",x:20,y:18,walkspeed:50,dir:"s",elem:"WATER",conv:"c_ch3sq6"});
}
